title: Top Places to visit in Sonitpur, Tezpur, Assam
content: Sonitpur is an administrative district in the state of Assam in India. It stands among the largest districts of Assam. In terms of area Sonitpur is the second largest district of Assam after Karbi Anglong district. It is spread over an area of 5324 km2 on the northern banks of Brahmaputra, the li

Top Places to visit in Udalguri, Assam
content:
Udalguri district, is a district in the Bodoland Territorial Area of the state of Assam in north-eastern India. Udalguri town is the headquarters of the district.

title: Top Places to visit in West Karbi Anglong, Hamren, Assam
content: The West Karbi Anglong district is a new district formed out of the existing Karbi Anglong District of Assam in 2016. Hamren is the headquarter of the newly formed district. The district is a part of Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council, Diphu and it is administered according to the Sixth Scheduled o

title: Father, brother killed in accident on exam eve, Ghaziabad girl scores 92.4% in class 10
content: On the eve of class 10 board exams, while other students were busy with last-minute revisions and hectic preparations, Tiya Singh was coping with her world crumbling around her. title: Top Places to visit in North Goa, Panaji, Goa
content: North Goa is one of the two districts that make up the state of Goa in India. The district has an area of 1736 km², and is bounded by Sindhudurg district of Maharashtra state to the north and by Belgaum district of Karnataka to the east, by South Goa District to the south, and by the Arabian

title: Science says you sleep better if you have a loving partner!
content:
​The science behind your goodnight sleep.

title: Top Places to visit in South Goa, Margao, Goa
content: South Goa is one of two districts that comprises the state of Goa in West India, within the region known as the Konkan. It is bounded by the district of North Goa to the north, the Uttara Kannada district of Karnataka state to the east and south, while the Arabian Sea forms its western coast.
